Name: Image.RGBSubpixel
Desc: Apply RGB subpixel emulation effect to an image.
Example:
const image = Q.Image();
image.RGBSubpixel({ subpixelLayout: 'rgb', subpixelScale: 3.0 }); // Applies RGB subpixel effect
image.RGBSubpixel({ scanlines: true, phosphorSize: 0.7 }); // Applies subpixel effect with scanlines
